Articles.Content: Yeah what he said!

I just wish Macey would say something somewhere on the internet. He has done nothing on the internet (that i can find) for over 6 months, and it would just be soo reasuring to know he is still making content for youtube and we can expect something eventually. How much effort is needed to make a short post on the forums? Not much. Please Macey, dont keep us in limbo and longer.

How do i post photos? Because i just finished my ship.

Edited February 25, 2014 by Everten P.

How do i post photos? Because i just finished my ship.

Upload your images through imageshack or imgur, then copy the BBCode link and paste the link on your post.

hey Chozo Nomad, I asked a little while ago if the hanland Pilot seat was taken. Personally I would be beyond honored to do it and I would never back out like the last one did.....

PICK ME
So I moved all my proof of travels into a ZIP file and my first reaction was.I honestly don't know why I keep them at this point though.

So I have been going back and looking at others ships, and many are missing DL links, pics, and info.

Not cool
Lots of people gave up on macey. I went through before to compile all the submissions and a fair few still worked. Sorry some of mine don't work, the ships were a bit rubbish.

Lots of people gave up on macey. I went through before to compile all the submissions and a fair few still worked. Sorry some of mine don't work, the ships were a bit rubbish.

I am mostly talking about in the first 150 post. When the page was booming

I'm on page 3 and 12 Are you going into the restoration business?

Edited April 20, 2014 by Spartwo

I'm on page 3 and 12 Are you going into the restoration business?

Nope just shopping for ideas

Lots of people gave up on macey. I went through before to compile all the submissions and a fair few still worked. Sorry some of mine don't work, the ships were a bit rubbish.

Thanks for doing that, by the way.

So, maybe some of us should make, well, I don't know, some sort of follow-up series to the "macey's dreams" YT series?

Maybe from the POV of our own companies, using the modernized Spiritwolf and Hanland ships as in-universe updates to their fleets?

Just a thought...

EDIT:

Also, are any submissions still allowed? I might put a couple of my warships up once they've been updated and had lifters built.

Edited April 20, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h
Yes. You could skip the second part and build for Hanlan.

My MK 1.5 UNSC destroyer. I will release the MK 2 later on, but the mk 1.5 has survived multiple simultaneous direct hits by large srb torpedoes and I beam dumb swarm barrages with almost no damage.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

With unarmed ares missiles, during the weapons development. Warheads were added later, and note the two large sized weapons bays along with space on the sides of the front for more guided missiles.

So, maybe some of us should make, well, I don't know, some sort of follow-up series to the "macey's dreams" YT series?

Maybe from the POV of our own companies, using the modernized Spiritwolf and Hanland ships as in-universe updates to their fleets?

Just a thought...

I had thought of such a thing myself, and thought it could be something really fun! But I couldn't bring myself to hijack the SpiritWolf and Hanland names and scenario. I would instead suggest a community project for something similar...a different story altogether, frankly, to avoid stepping on Macey's wonderful creation. I started something like it of my own, but haven't really dedicated the time it takes and have done no recording thus far.

Anyway, just my two cents. I haven't seen the series in a while, I might go back and watch it sometime soon.

I had thought of such a thing myself, and thought it could be something really fun! But I couldn't bring myself to hijack the SpiritWolf and Hanland names and scenario. I would instead suggest a community project for something similar...a different story altogether, frankly, to avoid stepping on Macey's wonderful creation. I started something like it of my own, but haven't really dedicated the time it takes and have done no recording thus far.

Anyway, just my two cents. I haven't seen the series in a while, I might go back and watch it sometime soon.

I would definitely have started making a series already, if it weren't for the fact that my current graphics unit is in NO WAY capable of running KSP (or most games, for that matter) whilst recording video.

I might be upgrading my GPU soon, though. That or I'll use a capture card. I have the VFX software to compile.... so otherwise it isn't too hard.

I would definitely have started making a series already, if it weren't for the fact that my current graphics unit is in NO WAY capable of running KSP (or most games, for that matter) whilst recording video.

I might be upgrading my GPU soon, though. That or I'll use a capture card. I have the VFX software to compile.... so otherwise it isn't too hard.

Shoot, the only thing holding me back is time commitment...it takes a lot of work to record, cut, and post all that material, not to mention design and build time, and of course, accounting for catastrophes...
As an owner of a gtx 760, I should probably be able to help. The only thing holding me back is the fx 6300 amd processor in my computer.

I've been writing a story for the past few months that I think would be good. I just have no idea on what to do with it. I'd also like to ask other writers for their opinion. It would be mod free until the end of the story, with interstellar and Orbital Construction being added.

Edited June 2, 2014 by Astronut25

Hey i have a figther for the Spiritwolf I'll post later but I can say some statistics:

Weapons: 2 missiles (macey design),1 Cruise missile (my design)

Engine:Rapier engine

See ya later Sudamerikan Aeronautics and Space

So it's almost been a year since we heard from him.

Did he die?

Check out My Hangar - all stock craft, and all able to get to any planet without a problem. Some do exceed the 300 part limit though...

JR

Just thought I'd let everyone know that I'm now accepting ships for my series.

So if you've nothing better to do and finally want to see the ships you built appear in a video...

You Know What To Do.

HatBat's newest cinematic gives Macey Dean fans a new hope:
